attributes.title: absolutely awful

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: worst app ever it made my phone glitch in so many different ways i had to go get a new one because after i downloaded the app my phone just glitched and didn’t turn back on i need my 1,200 dollars back

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it literally made my phone a white supremacist. It started yelling ALL LIVES MATTER and TRUMP 2020 at me! I will not be using this app any further.
